data.text:
🏌️‍♀️Is it #spring yet? 🌸
🏵️ Well, it's still a while to go, but we already have a lot of #GolfHolidays ideas in Italy for you. Just pop by at the #GolfTage in Munich🏌️‍♂️
February 23rd to 25th, 2018 
Stand D6, Hall C3 https://t.co/CvgYXnbWxJ

data.text:
Stop just dreaming about #Italy. 
We know how to get you there in no time! Just pop by at our stand at the https://t.co/zlxCo8Z3Ts.e trade show.
When? From February the 21st to the 25th, 2018.
Where? In Munich, Hall B5, BOOTH 410.
We will be waiting for you all ✈️😊 https://t.co/kpXCWgNsD2

#AlternativeGuide is online! The #socialite, the #intellectual, the #sportytype, the #insider and the #explorer show you Bari from all a new side. Curious? Wanna find out more? 🤓😊 Just visit https://t.co/wilxPcWril https://t.co/XOGBbD2dZg
Have you already had a look at our new #SpazioItalia magazine? 🤓https://t.co/ToW2x2oG84 https://t.co/h957aWjJ90

"Almond Blossoms" #VanGogh, 1890
This painting came to life as a means of celebration of the arrival of Van Gogh's nephew. Pop by at the Van Gogh Alive – The Experience exhibition and get the chance to a 2x1 ticket showing your #AirDolomiti #boardingpass 

https://t.co/kmxR1wxxe3 https://t.co/HfEM1HdbHx

@BarryzahZ Good morning Mr Keane, we know you already are in touch with our Customer Service and they are doing everything on their power to reconnect you with your luggage. Should you be needing anything do not hesitate to contact us. BR/ Laure

data.text: @millalax @KLM @lufthansa Dear passenger, we are really sorry to read that and would like to apologize for the inconvenience. We know that yesterday has been a difficult day from a weather conditions point of view. We hope, anyway, that you have safely reached your destinaion. BR

@nat_latorre Gentile passeggera, ci dispiaciamo molto nel leggere le sue parole. Vorrebbe gentilmente raccontarci quanto accaduto tramite PM, inviandoci anche dettagli di volo, quale nr di prenotazione? In attesa di riscontro, Cordiali Saluti
RT @FedericoEdicola: @BLQairport @Air_Dolomiti by #night!! 😉buona serata! https://t.co/M0IDxxcFiT

@AlexBarberoBMX Gentile Signor Barbero, la ringraziamo molto per la sua segnalazione, in quanto è nel nostro interesse avere passeggeri soddisfatti. Sarà nostra cura inoltrare al reparto competente. La ringraziamo molto. Le auguriamo una buona giornata :)
@AlexBarberoBMX Gentile Signor Barbero, potrebbe gentilmente raccontarci cosa accaduto esattamente?

@ipinak Hi IP, we are terribly sorry for the inconvenience and our very late reply but we're experiencing a high volume of requests. Can you please send us your booking reference per DM? Best regards.

From 21/12 to 10/01 enjoy @AntinoriFamily & @FalescoOfficial wines and - if you fly business - creations by 3 talented Chefs from @jreitalia: Aurora Mazzucchelli, Leonardo Vescera & Filippo Saporito. https://t.co/2uEXm4ezIt
@Ciso85 @MUC_Airport @BLQairport @embraer @VolaBologna Grazie Alberto! Speriamo di riaverti presto a bordo!

data.text:
General #strike announced for November the 10th 2017.
Following #AirDolomiti legs have been cancelled: EN8195 & EN8197.
Due to the strike operational schedule changes might occur, we therefore kindly invite you to check your flight status before heading to the airport. https://t.co/7uzDDf5ZxD
